verses.verse: If <S%H3884><s%> it had not been Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> who was on our side, <S%H3478><s%> let Israel now say, <S%H559><s%>
if <S%H3884><s%> it had not been Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> who was on our side, <S%H120><s%> when men rose up against us; <S%H6965><s%>
then <S%H233><s%> they would have swallowed us up <S%H1104><s%> alive, <S%H2416><s%> when their wrath <S%H639><s%> was kindled against us; <S%H2734><s%>
then <S%H233><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> would have overwhelmed <S%H7857><s%> us, <S%H5158><s%> the stream would have gone over <S%H5674><s%> our soul; <S%H5315><s%>
then <S%H233><s%> the proud <S%H2121><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> would have gone over <S%H5674><s%> our soul. <S%H5315><s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> who has not given <S%H5414><s%> us as a prey <S%H2964><s%> to their teeth. <S%H8127><s%>

Our soul <S%H5315><s%> has escaped <S%H4422><s%> like a bird <S%H6833><s%> out of the fowler <S%H3369><s%>'s snare. <S%H6341><s%> The snare <S%H6341><s%> is broken, <S%H7665><s%> and we have escaped. <S%H4422><s%>
Our help <S%H5828><s%> is in the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> who made <S%H6213><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth. <S%H776><s%>
